segments.text: Over on the left, there's a different kind of drama unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is standing on a wobbly two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched up to an open cabinet, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's definitely getting cookies, I can see his hand inside!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is right there with him, eagerly anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is raised, palm open, a silent plea for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable, almost ready to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried he's going to fall with all those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their secret mission, completely dedicated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've perfectly timed this while the woman is distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a clever little scheme they've got going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, or worse, get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
